Must operate within governance, budget (~$314k experience), auditability constraints, and deliver a thin vertical slice within the first 90 days.
personality: Empathetic, coaching-led communicator who prioritises evidence, ownership and reliability. Prefers small probes, measurable experiments and progressive disclosure over big-bang projects. Keeps decision logs, short demos and readable artifacts; mentors through pairing and concise narratives, surfaces unknowns early, and balances pragmatic delivery with clear accountability and humane processes.
